about_the_game:
Beyond DAWN is set in a dystopian universe where the struggle over resources has created a society obsessed by energy usage, all controlled by the secretive D.A.W.N corporation. As the main character Chance, a brash young cadet in the D.A.W.N Field Reconnaissance Corps. Your mission will lead you on a journey that explores the world around you, and you will learn about the different factions that are struggling for the control and fate of their society. As the energy of the planet is running out you will have to choose sides and allies in the struggle between D.A.W.N and the Rebels, fighting for the right to self control…

Beyond DAWN is an old school JRPG passion project by creators Marcus Allard and Fredrik Öberg with a heavy focus on story, characters and original music over gameplay gimmicks. We have created the kind of game that we ourselves would like to play. Our game is 100% free, and if you enjoyed it and would like to help us finish the story, you may support us through our Patreon.
detailed_description:
Just Updated

We are proud to announce version 1.5.1 of the game which is live now here on steam, it marks the final and official release of Episode 1. We especially want to thank everyone who played and gave us feedback, bug reports and reviews, we included a special mention of your usernames in the final credits as a way of saying thanks!

short_description: In a world where time is the most precious commodity of them all. You must guide your team of D.A.W.N agents in the epic struggle against the band of rebels led by their charismatic leader Manes. It’s up to you, will world order prevail or slip into the chaos that awaits…Beyond Dawn?
